price: Hakika Sisi tumemtuma kwenu Mtume aliye shahidi juu yenu, kama tulivyo mtuma Mtume kwa Firauni.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا
footnotes: Enyi watu wa Makka! Hakika Sisi tumekutumieni Muhammad kuwa ni Mtume wa kukushuhudilieni Siku ya Kiyama kwa kukubali na kukataa, kama tulivyo mtuma Musa kwa Firauni awe ni Mtume.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ilaykum rasūlan shāhidan ʿalaykum kamā arsalnā ilā fir'ʿawna rasūlan
